short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to make the online Dominion game beep when its your turn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will beep at you when it is your turn. Turn on the volume and then feel free to go back to reading the news, or finishing up chores while you wait for your turn. No need to click any buttons or anything, just install it and forget about it.Look out for more features soon.
